entry.tran: 鞍囊;马褡裢;(自行车、摩托车车座后的)挂包
entry.def: A saddlebag is a bag fastened to the saddle of a bicycle or motorcycle, or the saddle of a horse.

means.word_mean: 1. a large bag (or pair of bags) hung over a saddle

auth_sentence.content: Galliano's Dior saddlebag, now sold in shops from Hong Kong to Houston, has helped the company earn millions.
